problem.markdown:
A quasi-static process is represented on a p-V diagram as well as a T-S diagram. Which of the following statements are true?
[ ] The area under the process line in the p-V diagram equals the work done by the system. [x] The area under the process line in the p-V diagram equals the expansion work done by the system [x] The area under the process line in the T-S diagram exceeds the heat absorbed by the system [ ] If the process is reversible, the area under the process line in the T-S diagram equals the heat absorbed by the system.
problem.p: A quasi-static process is represented on a p-V diagram as well as a T-S diagram. Which of the following statements are true?

checkboxgroup.choice: The area under the process line in the p-V diagram equals the work done by the system.
The area under the process line in the p-V diagram equals the expansion work done by the system
The area under the process line in the T-S diagram exceeds the heat absorbed by the system
If the process is reversible, the area under the process line in the T-S diagram equals the heat absorbed by the system.
